m_szDocTitle: Go Automobile, China's Great Wall Motor in RM2b energy-efficient vehicle venture - Business News | The Star Online
m_szDocSumamry: Thursday, 10 April 2014 | MYT 12:00 AM Go Automobile, China's Great Wall Motor in RM2b energy-efficient vehicle venture by eugene mahalingam International Trade and Industry Minister Datuk Seri Mustapa Mohamed (third from left) shaking hands with Go Automobile Manufacturing Sdn Bhd chief executive officer Ahmad Azam Sulaiman at a press conference announcing the granting of the first energy efficient vehicle license on April 9. Looking on (from left to right) are Malaysian Automotive Institute chairman Datuk Muhamad Noor Yacob, International Trade and Industry Ministry secretary general Datuk D
